You create a wave of green slime that begins at the range you choose and violently spreads to the limit of the area. Each creature in the area that fails its Reflex save is covered with one patch of green slime for every 5 feet of its face. Green slime devours flesh and organic materials on contact, and even dissolves metal. A patch of green slime deals 1d6 points of temporary Constitution damage per round while it devours flesh. Against wood or metal, green slime deals 2d6 points of damage per round, ignor- ing the hardness of metal but not that of wood. It does not harm stone.
